listitem.para: Ends the running of the procedure in which it appears. Control is returned to the context in which that procedure was invoked. The stopped procedure does not output a value.

listitem.programlisting:
TO MYPROG :arg PRINT [Before Stop] IF 1=:arg [stop] PRINT [After Stop] END
MYPROG 1 Before Stop
MYPROG 2 Before Stop After Stop
